page.title: 07YOXALL RECREATION
page.content: Sporting facilities are varied,outdoor being three football teams,a cricket club and indoor snooker and four badminton clubs. For young males there are four groups within the Boy Scout movement: Beavers,Cubs,Scouts and Venture Scouts. For girls there are Brownies and Guides. There is a Youth Club for boys and girls in the village but some go to Barton-under-Needwood Y.C. to meet friends. Young Wives meet weekly with their children and Mothers Union have meetings for Church members The local branch of the Women's Institute offers practical instruction and topical discussions of a non- political and non-sectarian nature.The Gardening Guild members meet to share ideas and hear lectures on all aspects of gardening. The Royal British Legion is a club for ex-Service people.Senior Citizens meet weekly.
